Package DatabaseAdmin

Class ReadWriteToDatabase

java.lang.Object
DatabaseAdmin.ReadWriteToDatabase
public class ReadWriteToDatabase extends Object
This is a sample light weight database application That can have multiple users and can have multiple tables and database for each user The scope of the login exists beyond the execution of the program as the authentication Information is stored in the log file present at - src/main/java/Assets/userAuth.txt landing page is where the entire application is bootstrapped at.
Since:
Feb 26, 2023

    • createTableFromQuery

      public boolean createTableFromQuery(String tableName, List<String> decomposedQuery, String username, String currentUsedDatabase)
      This function is used to create 2 tiles the schema that stores column definination and the user name the table txt file that stores the records seperated by "-" and ";"
      Parameters:
      tableName - the table name
      decomposedQuery - the decomposed query
      username - the username of the user
      currentUsedDatabase - the current used database
      Returns:
      returns true if table is created

      username - the username of the user

      Returns:
      true or false depending on the operation
